title: SID Malang Medina City
description: Information system for internal dashboard of Malang Medina City. Planning, designing, and developing a web-based information system for internal use, including a dashboard for monitoring and managing data.

title: Proyekin
description: Freelancer web platform for Fasilkom UI. Developed and implemented a Golang API with Design Pattern for efficient services, including notification and chat room endpoints.

title: Reviewin
description: Peer-based CV Review Platform. Developed a GraphQL API backend with seamless integration, implemented JWT-based authentication for secure access.
